choose.when: select * from integration.t_sys_permission where del_flag = 0 order by sort_no
choose.otherwise: select a.* from t_sys_permission a left join t_sys_role_permission b on a.id = b.permission_id where b.role_id = #{roleId} and a.del_flag = 0 order by a.sort_no

choose.when: select * from integration.t_sys_permission where del_flag = 0 and menu_type = 0 order by sort_no
choose.otherwise: select a.* from t_sys_permission a left join t_sys_role_permission b on a.id = b.permission_id where b.role_id = #{roleId} and a.del_flag = 0 and menu_type = 0 order by a.sort_no
